Package cz.cuni.mff.desitka.client.gameLogic

Class GameViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.client.gameLogic.GameViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStates, JoiningResults
public class GameViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel implements JoiningResults, GameStates
ViewModel for the game, managing the game state and interactions with the GameModel.
